body_html:
Thanks for the prompt response!
TF r.1.2 can successfully be built with cuda 8.0. But, on the workstation, I don't have the privilege to upgrade the current cuda driver 352.93, which didn't support cuda 8.0.

PS. Commit a4b352b works fine with cuda 7.5 and also included the updating RNNCell objects changes.
body_text:
Thanks for the prompt response!
TF r.1.2 can successfully be built with cuda 8.0. But, on the workstation, I don't have the privilege to upgrade the current cuda driver 352.93, which didn't support cuda 8.0.
PS. Commit a4b352b works fine with cuda 7.5 and also included the updating RNNCell objects changes.
body:
Thanks for the prompt response!
TF r.1.2 can successfully be built with cuda 8.0. But, on the workstation, I don't have the privilege to upgrade the current cuda driver 352.93, which didn't support cuda 8.0.

PS. Commit [a4b352b](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/a4b352) works fine with cuda 7.5 and also included the updating RNNCell objects changes.
